info.title: Arabhardware API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Arabhardware project. It provides a comprehensive guide to interacting with the API endpoints.

post.summary: Mark a sales order as Confirmed

200.description: Sales order status changed to Confirmed

message.example: Sales order status has been changed to 'Confirmed'.

post.summary: Mark a sales order as Void

200.description: Sales order status changed to Void

message.example: The status of the Sales Order has been changed to void.

parameters.name: salesorder_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of sales order IDs

200.description: Bulk sales order status changed to Confirmed

message.example: Sales order status has been changed to Confirmed.
The status of the sales order has been changed to Open.
